page.title: 14SUMMER DAYS.
page.content: My name is Chris Timons.I live at the Cottage,Upper Langwith,where I was born almost 11years ago.I enjoy meeting my friends,Glen McBroom,Richard Thomson and Sean Harris,who come to my home after school.We often go for walks to Guildy Wells or the Mill Dam where we amuse ourselves throwing stones into the stream and splashing each other.We've all got the same types of sports bicycles on which we go riding around the village,Langwith,Shirebrook and on to the Comprehensive School field,which is the favourite because it has hills and humps,spills and jumps.At other times we enjoy ourselves climbing the fruit trees in our orchard,playing cricket and football,or tennis when we find the racquets and balls.
